entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
